title: Can we write the NEET exam after 5 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: As per the Honble Supreme Court Order of March-April 2017 you can write NEET exam at any age. But if you have attempted NEET for the first time in 2017,you still have two more attempts . As per CBSE a person can attempt NEET only thrice{for gen category} and NEET 2017 will be counted as your first attempt.
